segment.source: About User Experience Virtualization 1.0
segment.target: About User Experience Virtualization 1.0

segment.source: About User Experience Virtualization 1.0
segment.target: About User Experience Virtualization 1.0

segment.source: About User Experience Virtualization 1.0
segment.target: About User Experience Virtualization 1.0

segment.source: Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) monitors the changes that are made by users to application settings and Windows operating system settings.
segment.target: Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) monitors the changes that are made by users to application settings and Windows operating system settings.

segment.source: The user settings are captured and centralized to a settings storage location.
segment.target: The user settings are captured and centralized to a settings storage location.

segment.source: These settings can then be applied to the different computers that are accessed by the user, including desktop computers, laptop computers, and virtual desktop infrastructure (VDI) sessions.
segment.target: These settings can then be applied to the different computers that are accessed by the user, including desktop computers, laptop computers, and virtual desktop infrastructure (VDI) sessions.

segment.source: User Experience Virtualization uses settings location templates to specify what applications and Windows settings on the user computers are monitored and centralized.
segment.target: User Experience Virtualization uses settings location templates to specify what applications and Windows settings on the user computers are monitored and centralized.

segment.source: The settings location template is an XML file that specifies which file and registry locations are associated with each application or operating system setting.
segment.target: The settings location template is an XML file that specifies which file and registry locations are associated with each application or operating system setting.

segment.source: The template does not contain values for the settings; it contains only the locations of the settings that are to be monitored.
segment.target: The template does not contain values for the settings; it contains only the locations of the settings that are to be monitored.

segment.source: The application settings and Windows settings are monitored by UE-V when users are working on their computers.
segment.target: The application settings and Windows settings are monitored by UE-V when users are working on their computers.

segment.source: The values for the application settings are stored on the settings storage server when the user closes the application.
segment.target: The values for the application settings are stored on the settings storage server when the user closes the application.

segment.source: The values for the Windows settings are stored when the user logs off, when the computer is locked, or when they disconnect remotely from a computer.
segment.target: The values for the Windows settings are stored when the user logs off, when the computer is locked, or when they disconnect remotely from a computer.

segment.source: An administrator can create a UE-V settings location template to specify which enterprise application settings will roam.
segment.target: An administrator can create a UE-V settings location template to specify which enterprise application settings will roam.

segment.source: UE-V includes a set of settings location templates for some Microsoft applications and Windows settings.
segment.target: UE-V includes a set of settings location templates for some Microsoft applications and Windows settings.

segment.source: For a list of default applications and settings in UE-V, see Planning Which Applications to Synchronize with UE-V 1.0.
segment.target: For a list of default applications and settings in UE-V, see Planning Which Applications to Synchronize with UE-V 1.0.

segment.source: UEV 1.0 Release Notes
segment.target: UEV 1.0 Release Notes

segment.source: For more information, and for late-breaking news that did not make it into the documentation, see Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) 1.0 Release Notes.
segment.target: For more information, and for late-breaking news that did not make it into the documentation, see Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) 1.0 Release Notes.
